cleaned_text: 5 Natural Ayurvedic Remedies To Fight Cold, Fever And Flu By Aditi Singh 2023-08-23T14:55:17+05:30 english.jagran.com Ayurvedic remedies to fight flu Here are six natural Ayurvedic remedies that are often used to help combat cold, fever, and flu symptoms. You can try out these remedies to get relief from on going viral. Tap to see! Tulsi Tulsi leaves are known for their immune-boosting properties. You can consume tulsi tea or chew on a few fresh leaves daily to get rid of flu symptoms. Ginger and Honey A mixture of ginger and honey can help soothe a sore throat and reduce congestion. It is recommended to consume it as a warm beverage. Turmeric Milk Turmeric has anti-inflammatory properties which will give your relief from flu. Mix a pinch of turmeric in warm milk and consume before bedtime. Take Steam Taking in steam that has been infused with eucalyptus oil or ajwain (carom seeds) can provide relief from congestion and other sinus-related discomforts that may accompany it. Gargling with Salt Water You can do gargles with warm salt water. It can help ease throat irritation and reduce swelling. We hope you liked this information.
